Item Weight 8.8 ounces
Country of Origin China
ASIN B09C932VHK
Item model number HJC90
Manufacturer recommended age 7 years and up
Best Sellers Rank #3,872 in Toys & Games (See Top 100 in Toys & Games)
#112 in Dedicated Deck Card Games
Customer Reviews

4.7 out of 5 stars

243 ratings

4.7 out of 5 stars

Release date February 9, 2022
Language English
Manufacturer Mattel

Price: $10.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:33:58 UTC – Details)


Get the fast-paced Reinhard Staupe’s BLINK card game in an exclusive tin. Blink is a fast-moving one-on-one card game that involves counting, shapes and colors. This tin makes a great addition to any game cupboard and helps to keep all your cards neat and organized! ready Ages 7 years and up. Colors and decorations may vary.
This exclusive tin comes with Reinhard Staupe’s fast-moving BLINK Card Game.
BLINK Card Game is a perfect choice for kid, teen or adult game night. Blink is a challenging game for 2 opponents with intense one-on-one play.
The Blink game features lightning-fast action by two players racing head-to-head to be the first to play all of their cards by matching the shape, count or color on the cards.
This sturdy tin makes card storage easy and makes a great gift for 7 year olds and up. Includes one card deck and instructions in a collectable storage tin.

Read more

Read more

Deal Out Fun on Game Night!

For 70 years, Mattel Games has been bringing family and friends together to play. Whatever your preference — matching, counting, speed or strategy — fun is always at hand with a Mattel Card Game.

Read more

item.title: UNO The Office Card Game with 112 Cards & Instructions, Gift for Kid, Adult or Family Game Night, Ages 7 Years & Older
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Product Dimensions 1.18 x 5.91 x 3.54 inches Item Weight 1.41 ounces Country of Origin China ASIN B084L2ZG4D Item model number GVH29 Manufacturer recommended age 7 – 11 years Best Sellers Rank #2,486 in Toys & Games (See Top 100 in Toys & Games) #193 in Board Games (Toys & Games) Customer Reviews 4.8 out ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Product Dimensions 1.18 x 5.91 x 3.54 inches
Item Weight 1.41 ounces
Country of Origin China
ASIN B084L2ZG4D
Item model number GVH29
Manufacturer recommended age 7 – 11 years
Best Sellers Rank #2,486 in Toys & Games (See Top 100 in Toys & Games)
#193 in Board Games (Toys & Games)
Customer Reviews

4.8 out of 5 stars

4,378 ratings

4.8 out of 5 stars

Release date June 1, 2020
Manufacturer Mattel

Price: $6.71
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:21:04 UTC – Details)


It’s the UNO matching card game everyone loves, but in a special edition featuring characters and settings from the incredibly popular TV series The Office. Players won’t have to survive small office boredom using sarcasm and hilarious pranks, but they will try to get rid of all the cards in their hand. And if you’re not quick, you may end up drawing card with the “Kevin’s Famous Chili” rule! Gameplay is the same as classic UNO with players matching colors and numbers as well as throwing down wild cards and penalty cards to trip up their opponents. When they’re down to one card, they have to shout like they just got a bonus, “UNO!” Makes a great gift for The Officefans, ages 7 years and older.
The Office meets UNO for this unique card game.
This collectible deck features graphics from the Dunder Mifflin Paper Company show everyone loves to binge-watch.
Whoever drops all their cards LAST has to draw two cards with the Kevin’s Famous Chili rule!
Match colors and numbers to the card on top of the discard pile and use wild and penalty cards to trip up the competition!
Great for kid, teen or adult game night for 2 to 10 players ages 7 years an older.

Read more

Read more

Everybody Wins on Family Game Night!

For 70 years, Mattel Games has been bringing family and friends together to play. From stimulating challenges to uncontrollable crack-ups, Mattel Family Games are designed for all ages so everyone can join and share the memories.

Read more

5
Price: $6.71
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:21:04 UTC – Details)
